channel.title: Need help!
channel.description: i dont know how to set up environmental variables for jdk 6 update 6 my compiler works but when i run serv it opens and closes really fast can sum 1 post their classpath and path plz :eek:

item.title: Need help!

item.description:
@ugtpwned wrote:

its not upper case can u just post me your path and class path if u have jdk 6 update 6
or tell me how to set them to the right files

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @_Rune_Realm ~Rune Realm
item.description:
@_Rune_Realm wrote:

Make sure your main class is called server.java and nothing else, (Not even Server.java, since java is case sensative).

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

well then click on your runserver.bat or run.bat , click edit and paste this in there

@echo off color 0a title Auorin 1.0 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @ugtpwned ugtpwned
item.description:
@ugtpwned wrote:

its not the compiler that closes its its the run server
i see some green letters then it closes really fast

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @_Rune_Realm ~Rune Realm
item.description:
@_Rune_Realm wrote:

You don’t need to set your classpaths, and it dissapears because you haven’t told it to pause. Use a compiler similar to this.

@echo off "path to javac\javac" *.java pause

Change “path to javac” to where it is stored.

Read full topic
